title: Starmaker
overview: Mia is a struggling actress who meets Jeremy, a wannabe scriptwriter. Together the two hatch a plan to blackmail Martin Anderson, a famous movie producer, by staging and secretly filming his illicit encounter with Mia. Martin caves in to their demands, but his no-nonsense, hard as nails wife Elise is having none of it, and enlists the help of hired muscle to put a stop to their scheme and make sure the story never hits the newsstands.
